overview: Bob Wise has been a leader in mobile software and networking for many years helping to grow some of the most successful companies in the industry. Prior to joining Opanga Bob was the Senior Vice President of Mobile Care at Nuance Communications where his team built and launched ground breaking customer care software on tens of millions of mobile handsets at carriers around the world. In addition Bob was CEO of ThinkFree one of the first cloud based SaaS office automation offerings, CTO at USWeb a 9000 person internet development company and VP of Worldwide Consulting at Novell a global leader in local area networking. Bob holds a BS degree in Computer Science.
